Flow.description: Screen flow for sending compliance emails for multi event compliance cases when Non-Compliance is accepted, or when the school is not contactable. Sent via action button on the parent compliance case record.

formulas.description: API name of email template based on user selection
formulas.name: emailTemplateName
formulas.expression: CASE({!emailType}, 'Closed - Compliance issue Accepted', 'Compliance_Monitoring_Non_Compliant_Accepted', 'Attempted - Not Reachable', 'Compliance_Monitoring_School_not_contactable', 'Non-Compliant Accepted', 'Compliance_Monitoring_Non_Compliant_Accepted', '')
